Methodology¶

Describe the methodology to calculate everything. Break into different sections. Give Intro

Here, we will put a flowchart or schematics to describe the entire workflow. This will be done last.

  1. Expander cycle: decription.

  2. Steady State: some more relevant description.

  3. Operating Maps

  4. Transient: some more relevant description.

Components¶

The following links describe the methodology to calculate the different components separately:

  • Mass flow rate: relies on sonic flow and choke nozzle-throat conditions.

  • Pressure drop: general expressions for static, acceleration, and form losses.

  • Pipe: steady-state and transient calculations based on inlet-outlet relations.

  • Turbopump: steady-state solution of the pump and turbine components via shaft work.
